entries.title: It’s 2023, and tech is still pushing unsafe products
entries.description: CES brings a flood of new products for consumers — often with little vetting from their makers.

entries.title: Last year was a huge year in space. Here’s what to look for in 2023.
entries.description: The announcement of which astronauts have been chosen for the Artemis II mission to orbit the moon is one highlight of 2023. Also on tap: SpaceX’s first launch to orbit of its giant Starship rocket.

entries.title: Battle to dethrone Tesla heats up just as Musk is distracted by Twitter
entries.description: Tesla still owns the lion’s share of the U.S. market, but it's falling thanks to a surge of competition. Ford, Kia, Chevy, Hyundai and Mercedes all have EV models challenging Tesla in the luxury market. And there are signs that Musk could be accelerating Tesla’s fall.
